focus_mode_text:
This moment is all about
focusing solely on yourself.
break_mode_text:
Lift your head, gaze at the sky,
and take a short break.
no_photos_gallery_message: No photos have been taken yet.
before_start_text:
Look at the scenery stretching
far away and capture it with a photo.
notification_template_with_seconds: {minutes} minutes {seconds} seconds later, we will remind you to relax your eyes.
notification_template_without_seconds: {minutes} minutes later, we will remind you to relax your eyes.
break_notification_template_with_seconds: {minutes} minutes {seconds} seconds later, we will remind you to get ready to focus again.
break_notification_template_without_seco: {minutes} minutes later, we will remind you to get ready to focus again.
delete_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to delete?
face_not_detected_msg: Face not detected. Please try again.
profile.delete_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to delete this vision record?
profile.no_record:
No records.
Press the FAB to add vision.
